title: Default values not shown in Show Report Parameters dialog
OB: When previewing a report and clicking the Show Report Parameters button, the Enter Parameters dialog opens. However, the value boxes in this dialog are empty, even though default values should be shown.
EB: When previewing a report and clicking the Show Report Parameters button, I expect the Enter Parameters dialog to display the default values in the value boxes. This way, I can easily modify the parameter I want to change without having to input all values again.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create several report parameters. 
2. Set default values for the parameters. 
3. Drag the parameters to the report layout. 
4. Preview the report. 
5. Click the Show Report Parameters button. 
6. Observe that the Enter Parameters dialog opens with empty value boxes instead of showing the default values.
